alert.note: Alert for Allen; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 24 at 4:37AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1245 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Kinder. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of wooded areas near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 2.0 feet. - Continued segmented lines of heavy showers / thunderstorms will allow for additional rainfall over this area through through at least Thursday morning with only brief lulls in precipitation. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Calcasieu River Kinder 16.0 2.0 Wed 4 am CST 12.5 14.7 16.0 &&
